otp_code_send_to_email: Please enter the 6-digit code sent to your email.
otp_code_send_to_smartOtp: Please enter the 6-digit code sent to your email in order to proceed with the Nami Smart OTP setting.
verify_2fa_description: Please enter the verification code on the Google Authenticator to continue.
payment_method_description: After clicking "Buy", please transfer the amount to the partner within 10 minutes before the buy order is automatically canceled.
notes:
• Check the right account name, account number, and description
  • Transfer the right and exact amount; do not round or remove unusual numbers.
  • Finish the transfer within 10 minutes of pressing "I have transferred" so that the order is not canceled.
note_waiting_confirm: Payment is only made when the order is confirmed by the partner
note_complete_dispute: Order is currently in dispute. By pressing "Success", you resolve the dispute effortlessly and update its status to Success.
resolve_dispute_description: By pressing "Confirm", you have received the full amount from the user/partner. Order status will be updated to Success

rating_modal.title: Partner Review
rating_modal.description: How satisfied are you with this partner's transaction?
rating_modal.rated_success: Thank you, we have acknowledged your feedback to continuously improve the quality of our service every day.

transfer_confirm_description.user: When you click the confirm button, you will transfer the money to the partner, please carefully check the amount and the content of the transfer before making.
transfer_confirm_description.partner: When you click the confirm button, you will transfer the money to the user, please carefully check the amount and the content of the transfer before making.

take_money_confirm_description.user: When you click the confirm button, you will received the money from partner, please carefully check the amount received and the content of the transfer before making.
take_money_confirm_description.partner: When you click the confirm button, you will received the money from the user, please carefully check the amount received and the content of the transfer before making.

partner_reject_order_transaction: Are you sure you want to reject {{side}} order #{{orderId}} of <2>{{amount}} {{asset}}</2>?
cancel_order_buy_description: Are you sure you want to cancel Buy order #{{orderId}} of <2>{{amount}} {{asset}}</2>? {{note}}
cancel_order_note: Note: Your money will not be reimbursed when canceling order after completing the transfer.
cancel_order_sell_description: Are you sure you want to cancel Sell order #{{orderId}} of <2>{{amount}} {{asset}}</2>? {{note}}
cancel_order_success: Order #{{orderId}} to {{side}} <2>{{amount}} {{asset}}</2> has been cancelled successfully.
appeal_description: Complaint will change the status of Order #{{orderId}} to the status of Disputing, the {{mode}} is required to provide proofs related to the transaction such as pictures, messages,...
commission_rate_description: Commission Generated Rate = Number of orders generated commission / Total number of success
notice_chart_details: Click on each column for details
standard_partner_des: Partners regularly receive deposit and withdrawal orders with speedy order processing time and obtain numerous positive user reviews.
add_phone_description: Please provide us with your telephone number to begin using our service.
otp_code_send_to_phone: Enter the 6 digit code sent to your phone.
add_phone_success: Congrats! You have successfully verified your phone number. You can now start to trade via partner
resend_otp_success: A new OTP has been sent to your phone number.
disabled_smart_otp_des: Smart OTP feature has been deactivated due to incorrect Smart OTP input 5 times. Please verify transactions with another OTP methods or reactivate Smart OTP to continue using.

error.reach_limit_withdraw: The daily {{asset}} quantity sold has surpassed the remaining maximum limit
error.not_enough_money: The partner's available balance is not enough to accept this order, please choose another partner
error.max_greater_min: The maximum amount must be greater than the minimum amount
error.exceeding_limit: It is not possible to create more than 2 deposit and 2 withdrawal orders via Deposit and Withdrawal Partner, please complete pending orders before creating a new Order.
error.not_found_order: Order #{{displayingId}} not found or being processed, please reload or contact support.
error.invalid_otp: OTP is invalid. Please try again.
error.invalid_secret: Please confirm PIN code in app first.
error.invalid_smart_otp: Verification code is incorrect {{timesErr}}/5, please try again

logs.uploaded_proof: Order is updated the proof of transfer
logs.received_fiat: Order is marked "I have received Fiat"
logs.resolve_dispute: Order is succeeded in resolving the dispute by {{mode}}
logs.timeout_not_accept: Order is rejected due to overdue time to accept
logs.timeout_not_transfer: Order is rejected due to no transfer confirmation by {{mode}}
logs.timeout_not_receive: Order is disputed due to no received confirmation by {{mode}}
logs.system_resolved_dispute_to_success: Order is resolved the dispute to the status: Success
logs.system_resolved_dispute_to_rejected: Order is resolved the dispute to the status: Rejected
logs.system_success: Order is updated to the status: Success
logs.system_reject: Order is updated to the status: Rejected
logs.system_dispute: Order is updated to the status: Disputed
